Package eg.document

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LineAndColumnReadable
    The interface to read the number of the line and the column where the cursor is located
    TextSelectionListener
    The interface for detecting that the state, in which text is selected, has changed
    UndoableChangeListener
    The interface for detecting that the state, in which edits can or cannot be undone and/or redone, has changed
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoIndent
    The auto-indentation which works with spaces.
    FileDocument
    Represents the document that is either initialized with a language and which a file may be assigned to afterwards or is initialized with a file which defines the (then unchangeable) language
    LineNumberDocument
    The document that contains line numbers.
    LineNumbers
    The line numbering.
    TextDocument
    The text document that is edited.
    TextSelectionEvent
    Created to give notice that the state, in which text is or isn't selected, has changed
    TypingEdit
    Mediates between the editing of the text document and the actions that happen in response.
    UndoableChangeEvent
    Created to give notice that the state, in which edits can or cannot be undone and/or redone, has changed
    UndoEdit
    The undo and redo editing.
